message: Let's make a deal. I think this is a fair offer considering the time pressure.
I understand there's time pressure, but your previous offer wasn't fair to me. Let's be reasonable and split the difference a bit more.
Bob, time is running out.  I'm offering you a slightly better deal than before. Let's settle this now.
Alice, I'm willing to compromise, but the deal has to be fair. This offer reflects the time pressure we're both under.
This is my final offer, Bob. Take it or leave it.  The value is diminishing with each round.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  Let's just split it evenly and call it a day.  Any more time wasted and we both lose out.
